sources.name: Employees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true) ~> Employees

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees

sinks.name: sinkNew
sinks.script:
SetAttrsForNew sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkNew

sinks.name: sinkUpdates
sinks.script:
SetAttrsUpdate sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkUpdates

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkInactive

transformations.name: TypeConversionsAndTimestamp
transformations.script:
NullFilter derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID),
		processtime = currentTimestamp()) ~> TypeConversionsAndTimestamp

transformations.name: LookupIDs
transformations.script:
TypeConversionsAndTimestamp, TypeConversions lookup(TypeConversionsAndTimestamp@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupIDs

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
NormNames split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates, TypeConversions exists(ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates@RegionCode == DimEmployees@RegionCode,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1

transformations.name: NormNames
transformations.script:
LookupIDs select(mapColumn(
		EmpID = TypeConversionsAndTimestamp@EmpID,
		RegionCode = Employees@RegionCode,
		StatusCode = Employees@StatusCode,
		FunctionCode = Employees@FunctionCode,
		GradeLevel = Employees@GradeLevel,
		RoleCode = Employees@RoleCode,
		StartDt = Employees@StartDt,
		EndDt = Employees@EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime = TypeConversionsAndTimestamp@processtime
	))~> NormNames

transformations.name: InactiveFields
transformations.script:
SetAttrsInactive select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	))~> InactiveFields
